BR_text.BRsummary: Model Visualization: layer names do not match exactly
BR_text.BRdescription: The layer names that are displayed when callingcoremltools.utils.visualize_spec(...) do not match exactly the layer names in the spec. The visualization always capitalizes the first letter of the name. This is a minor issue.

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link>
  could you explain more in detail?

comments_2.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Sai-Adarsh>@Sai-Adarsh</denchmark-link>
  - Please go right ahead and work on this. I'm happy to code review your pull request. To further clarify: the upper/lower cases names in the visualization do not match what is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/coremltools/blob/555064cb4234f38a45c0389563505fe409eb8f7f/mlmodel/format/NeuralNetwork.proto#L356>here</denchmark-link>
 . This get annoying, especially if you're trying to copy and paste things.
